KChangeIdentity.VERIFICATION_MESSAGE: Please wait while applying your changes
KChangeIdentity.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Your email address {{email}} has been changed
KChangeIdentity.ERROR_MESSAGE_ALREADY_APPLIED: Your changes have already been applied
KChangeIdentity.ERROR_MESSAGE_BAD_PARAMS: Your changes have already been verified or your account has been removed
KChangeIdentity.ERROR_MESSAGE_VERIFY_EXPIRED: The delay to apply your changes has expired, please resend the changes email with the link below
KChangeIdentity.ERROR_MESSAGE_DEFAULT: Your changes have not been applied

KChangePassword.TITLE: Change your password ?
KChangePassword.MESSAGE: Please enter your old and new passwords to proceed
KChangePassword.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Password changed, you will receive a confirmation email
KChangePassword.ERROR_MESSAGE_BAD_PARAMS: Your password has already been changed or your account has been removed
KChangePassword.ERROR_MESSAGE_DEFAULT: Error while trying to change password, please try again later

KResendVerifySignup.TITLE: 'Resend verification email'
KResendVerifySignup.MESSAGE: We shall send you the signup verification email again
KResendVerifySignup.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Email sent, please check your inbox
KResendVerifySignup.ERROR_MESSAGE_NOTHING_TO_VERIFY: Your email address has already been verified
KResendVerifySignup.ERROR_MESSAGE_DEFAULT: Error while sending email, please check the address and send it again or try again later

KResetPassword.TITLE: Reset your password ?
KResetPassword.MESSAGE: Please enter your new password to proceed
KResetPassword.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Password reset, you will receive a confirmation email
KResetPassword.ERROR_MESSAGE_BAD_PARAMS: Your password has already been reset or your account has been removed
KResetPassword.ERROR_MESSAGE_VERIFY_EXPIRED: The delay to reset has expired, please resend the reset password email with the link below
KResetPassword.ERROR_MESSAGE_DEFAULT: Error while trying to reset password, please try again later

KSendChangeIdentity.TITLE: Change your email address ?
KSendChangeIdentity.MESSAGE: Please enter your password and new email address to proceed
KSendChangeIdentity.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Email sent to your new email account, please check your inbox
KSendChangeIdentity.ERROR_MESSAGE_BAD_PASSWORD: Please enter your correct password and try again
KSendChangeIdentity.ERROR_MESSAGE_BAD_PARAMS: Your identity has already been changed or your account has been removed
KSendChangeIdentity.ERROR_MESSAGE_DEFAULT: Error while sending email, please try again later

KSendResetPassword.TITLE: Send reset password email
KSendResetPassword.MESSAGE: We shall email you instructions on how to reset your password
KSendResetPassword.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Email sent, please check your inbox
KSendResetPassword.ERROR_MESSAGE_IS_VERIFIED: Check your inbox and verify your email address first
KSendResetPassword.ERROR_MESSAGE_DEFAULT: Error while sending email, please check the address and send it again or try again later

KSignupAlert.TITLE: Your email address has not been verified, please check your mailbox
KSignupAlert.HELP_LABEL: Why should I verify my email address ?
KSignupAlert.HELP_TEXT: Verifying your email address improves the security of your account. Once you have verified your email address, both your password and access to your email account are required in order to make any changes to your account credentials, such as your password and contact email address. This helps further protect your account from being stolen by a potential phisher.
KSignupAlert.EMAIL_LABEL: I never received the verification email, what should I do ?
KSignupAlert.EMAIL_TEXT: If you do not receive your signup verification email and you are running a Spam filter, check and make sure the message has not been filtered as spam. Please try adding email-notifications@kalisio.com to your contacts or trusted senders list within your email client and attempt to re-verify your email address. You can also click the button below and we'll send you the email again.

KVerifySignup.TITLE: Email adress verification
KVerifySignup.MESSAGE: Please wait while verifying your email address
KVerifySignup.SUCCESS_MESSAGE: Your email address {{email}} has been verified
KVerifySignup.ERROR_MESSAGE_NOTHING_TO_VERIFY: Your email address has already been verified
KVerifySignup.ERROR_MESSAGE_BAD_PARAMS: Your email address has already been verified or your account has been removed
KVerifySignup.ERROR_MESSAGE_VERIFY_EXPIRED: The delay to verify your email address has expired, please resend the verification email with the link below
KVerifySignup.ERROR_MESSAGE_DEFAULT: Your email address has not been verified

KDeviceCard.UNLINK_DIALOG_MESSAGE:
Are you sure you want to unlink device {{description}} from your account ?

You will not be able to receive notifications until you reconnect using the device.
